purna shri lanka kandayamak wasara 6 kata pasuwa wides boksin tharagawaliyakata indrajith subasinha wasara 6 pamana kalayakin anathuruwa purna shri lanka kandayama sahabhagiwana wides boksin tharagawaliya hewath shahid benasir butho anusmarana jathyanthara boksin tharagawaliya 2011hi tharaga mema 23da pakisthanaye slamabadhidi arambae. 2005 wasaredi wiyatnamaye pawathi jathyanthara tharagawaliyata sahabhagiwimen anathuruwa siyaluma bara panthi sandaha shri lanka niyojanayak labena palamu tharagawaliyata amatharawa salakiya yuthu mattame mudal thyaga pirinamena tharagawalikata shri lankawa sahabhagiwana prathama awasthawada meyawe.

usas adhyapanaya wruththiya ha karmika adhyapanaya ha ehi gunathmakabhawaya sahathika kirima, agayima, piliganima yana ansha 3 yatathe nirdesha sakas kara thibe.wishwa widyala pahasukam wadi diyunu kirima, adhyapana patamalawala pramithiya ihala damima ha eewaye gunathmaka bhawaya wardhanaya kirima sandaha wu yojanada memagin idiripath kerena athara, wishwa widyala ha usas adhyapana aayathana athara anthar sambandhatha pawathwa ganima pilibandawa nirdesha da meyata athulath we.sas adhyapanaya ha thakshana wruththiya adhyapanaya pilibanda jathika prathipaththi ramuwa sahitha mema warthawa janadhipathiwarayata bharadun awasthawata adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana ha tharuna katayuthu amathi dalas alahapperuma yana mahathwaru athulu pirisakda ekwuha.
dannawane ayi kiyala..hariyatama awurudu 25kata kalin ee wage dawasaka thama man ipadune..
ema kandayame dorata wadima pamanayi 2018/02/26 dina siduwuye.
